generatedTitle: when did school of rock open

extractFactDictList.question: What musical theater was the show "School of Rock" based on?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The Broadway show "School of Rock" started previews on November 9, 2015, and officially opened on December 6, It was based on the film of the same name and tells the story of a wannabe rock star named Dewey Finn, who poses as a substitute teacher at a prestigious prep school.
